message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $115. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $100? I believe that would be a fair compromise.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $110? That would be a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but unfortunately, I am unable to go above $105 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
